#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define S(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define S2(a,b) scanf("%d%d",&a,&b)
#define r5 200055
#define r6 1000055
#define f(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define P(a) printf("%d",a)
#define PL(a) printf("%I64d",a)
#define pb push_back
#define nl printf("\n")
#define _s printf(" ")
#define X first
#define Y second
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int,int> ii;
typedef vector<int> vi;
ll inf = 179934567891234567LL;

int h[r5];
ll c[r5];
vector< pair<int,int> > adj[r5];
set< pair<ll,int> > q;
ll dist[r5];

ll dij(int u, int n){

    dist[u]=0;
    q.insert(make_pair(0,0));
    while(!q.empty()){
        int v = q.begin()->second;
        ll d = q.begin()->first;
        int i;
        q.erase(q.begin());
        f(i,0,adj[v].size()){
            int w = adj[v][i].first;
            ll cost = adj[v][i].second;
            if(dist[w] > dist[v] + cost){
                if(dist[w] != inf)
                    q.erase(make_pair(dist[w], w));
                dist[w] = dist[v] + cost;
                q.insert(make_pair(dist[w], w));
            }
        }
    }
    return dist[(2*n)+1];
}

int main() {
    int r,n,i;
    S2(n,r);
    f(i,1,n+1) {
        S(h[i]);
    }
    f(i,1,n+1) {
        scanf("%lld",&c[i]);
    }

    f(i,0,r) {
        int x,y;
        S2(x,y);
        if(h[x] <= h[y]) {
            adj[x].pb(ii(y,0));
            adj[y+n].pb(ii(x+n,0));
        }
        if(h[y] <= h[x]) {
            adj[y].pb(ii(x,0));
            adj[x+n].pb(ii(y+n,0));
        }
    }
    f(i,1,n+1){
        adj[i].pb(ii(i+n,c[i]));
        adj[i+n].pb(ii(i,c[i]));
    }

    f(i,0,r5){
        dist[i]=inf;
    }
    adj[0].pb(ii(1,c[1]));
    adj[0].pb(ii(n+1,c[1]));
    adj[n].pb(ii((2*n)+1 , 0));
    adj[2*n].pb(ii((2*n)+1 , 0));
    ll ans=dij(0,n);
    if(ans<inf) {
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    } else {
        printf("-1\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
